Max demon stock increases by 2.

Commander Skill: Can change 1 ally's demon. <tags=''11''g=''1'' id=''arg0''> turn required.
Commander Skill: Can change all allies' demons. <tags=''11''g=''1'' id=''arg0''> turns required.
Commander Skill: Narrows sabbath to a single target and increases its power. <tags=''11''g=''1'' id=''arg0''> turns required.
Commander Skill: Increases all allies' defense and prevents status ailments for 1 turn. <tags=''11''g=''1'' id=''arg0''> turns required.
Commander Skill: Increases a target ally's actions by 1. <tags=''11''g=''1'' id=''arg0''> turns required.
Commander Skill: For the turn used, all allies' Stack gains based on dealing HP damage increase by 1. <tags=''11''g=''1'' id=''arg0''> turns required.
Auto Commander Skill: At the start of an ally's turn, low chance of halving their MP costs.
Auto Commander Skill: At the start of an ally's turn, low chance of slight HP recovery for all allies over 3 turns.
Auto Commander Skill: At the start of an ally's turn, low chance of healing an ally's ailments.
Auto Commander Skill: At the start of an ally's turn, low chance of extending all allies' active buffs.
Auto Commander Skill: On ally's turn, if 2 or more allies are KO'd, they will be revived with full health. 1 use per battle.
